effect.unruffled.teleport.no_compass: A compass pointing to a lodestone is required to teleport.
effect.unruffled.teleport.no_teleport: Cannot teleport: not enough space around the lodestone.
advancements.nether.bad_brew.title: Shoddy Brewery
advancements.nether.bad_brew.description: Accidentally brew a Thick Potion while using a Brewing Stand without fuel.
advancements.nether.teleportation.title: Ender Transmission
advancements.nether.teleportation.descri: Teleport to a Lodestone using a Potion of Teleportation and a compass.
advancements.nether.pig_teleportation.de: Teleport to the End together with a Pig.
advancements.husbandry.aqua_affinity.des: Mine a block underwater with the Water Breathing effect.

advancements.story.ice.title: Ice Breaker
advancements.story.golden_pickaxe.title: Getting a Downgrade
advancements.story.golden_pickaxe.descri: Obtain a very fast but less durable Golden Pickaxe
advancements.adventure.fast_attack.title: Desperation Attack
advancements.adventure.fast_attack.descr: Perform two attacks in rapid succession, emptying your stamina bar as a result.
advancements.adventure.knockback.title: Go Away
advancements.adventure.knockback.descrip: Perform an attack with a powerful knockback right after jumping while sprinting.
advancements.adventure.charged_trident.d: Throw a Trident at a wool block to electrify it.
Throw a Trident at a lightning rod and wait for a lightning to strike it and turn it into a Magnetic Trident.
advancements.adventure.bundle.title: Extra Space
advancements.adventure.piercing.title: Two Birds, One Arrow
advancements.adventure.piercing.descript: Kill two mobs with a single Piercing Arrow.
advancements.adventure.heavy_inventory.d: Carry too many items in your inventory.
advancements.adventure.peaceful_chunk.de: Enjoy a peaceful night without monsters around your bed.
